reviewText: I bought this and rated it 5 stars because Derrick Davenport is one of my all-time favorites. Definitely was hoping for some better material. It's softcore mud wrestling. The whole film is only about 8 minutes long. If you like either of the two guys, then it's worth it.
the whole movie is 8 minutes long with some mud wrestling. waste of money.
A total waste of money,and no point. It was about 15 minutes of two men wrestling in the mud. That was it. Not kidding,I was so surprised , I actually laughed! A total joke and waste of money.

This dvd just made me mad!  The whole dvd lasted maybe 10 minutes and on top of that it was all in a slow motion set!  The two guys rubbed each other down with mud and then wrestled.. Ridiculous!  Such a waste!!!
This movie is a joke, 10 minutes of two guys splashing around in the mud.  A total waste.
